column2: Description Minimum a Graduate with good understanding of the Stock Market     Basic Knowledge of Technical & Fundamental Analysis     Good Communication skills - English & Local Language     We are looking for a skilled and detail-oriented Executive with a focus on dealing to join our financial services team     As an Executive: Dealing, you will be responsible for executing and managing financial transactions on behalf of clients, ensuring accuracy, compliance with regulations, and timely execution     Your role will be crucial in maintaining strong client relationships and contributing to the overall success of our financial services operations       Key Responsibilities:       Trade Execution: Execute buy and sell orders for financial instruments, including stocks, bonds, currencies, and derivatives, in accordance with client instructions and market conditions     Market Analysis: Monitor financial markets and stay informed about economic events, news, and trends that may impact trading decisions     Risk Management: Assess and manage risk associated with trading activities, including monitoring exposure limits and implementing risk mitigation strategies     Compliance: Ensure that all trading activities adhere to regulatory guidelines and compliance policies     Maintain accurate records of transactions and report any suspicious activities as required by regulations     Client Communication: Communicate with clients to provide trade execution updates, market insights, and investment recommendations     Build and maintain strong client relationships     Trade Settlement: Oversee the settlement of executed trades, including the confirmation of trades, delivery of securities, and receipt of funds     Order Routing: Utilize trading platforms and order routing systems effectively to execute client orders     Optimize order execution to achieve the best possible outcomes for clients     Performance Reporting: Prepare and distribute trade execution reports to clients, summarizing their portfolio performance and transactions     Continuous Learning: Stay up-to-date with industry trends, trading strategies, and regulatory changes     Seek opportunities for professional development and improvement       Qualifications:       Bachelor's degree in Finance, Economics, Business, or a related field     Master's degree or relevant certifications (e g, CFA, Series 7) are a plus     Proven experience as an Executive with a focus on dealing in the financial services industry, with [X] years of experience     Strong understanding of financial markets, trading strategies, and risk management principles     Proficiency in using trading platforms, order management systems, and market analysis tools     Knowledge of relevant financial regulations and compliance requirements     Excellent analytical and decision-making skills     Effective communication and client relationship management skills     Attention to detail and ability to work under pressure     Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking abilities
column11: Basic, Senior Executive, Stock market, Fundamental analysis

column2: Provide expert advice to clients on insurance products and services     Act as an intermediary between insurance companies and clients, ensuring that clients get the best possible insurance policies to suit their needs     Conduct interviews with prospective clients to gather data and identify their insurance needs     Sell life insurance policies that payout on death and annuities that pay an income at retirement     Expand the customer base by reaching out to potential clients and developing new business relationships     Analyze clients current portfolios and make recommendations on suitable coverage options     Assist clients throughout the claims process, ensuring that they get the payments they are entitled to under their insurance policies     Maintain accurate electronic and paper records of all client interactions and transactions     Candidate Qualifications      Must be licensed in the state where you work     Accredited with the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA)     Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written     Strong analytical skills and attention to detail     Proven track record of providing excellent customer service     Excellent selling skills, with a passion for meeting sales targets and expanding the customer base     Required Skills      Expert knowledge of life insurance policies and annuities     Strong sales skills, with a proven ability to meet and exceed sales targets     Good knowledge of financial and insurance regulations     Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with excellent time management skills
